pages.text: Orcas are large, aquatic, neutral mammals with black and white blubbery skin that can be found in Cold Oceans.$(br2)They love their preys, $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cachalot_whale)Cachalot Whale$(/l), they will jump out of the water to attack their prey and even break ice to get to them.$(br2)When near Orcas, players can get a rare change of gaining the Orca's Might effect which increases attack speed.
Don't try to attack an Orca! Or all nearby Orcas will attack you!
